resources.string: An error occurred while loading data. Try later.

This is an application that will help you determine which areas of your life need to be pumped in order to achieve harmony. 

Firstly, let's determine your current level. 

Do not rush to answer, be honest with yourself. 

Swipe right ->
How many points would you rate your relationship with your loved one, close people, family?
How many points would you rate your well-being? Do you play sports? What is your attitude towards health?
I try to take care of myself
I don\'t take care of my health
How many points would you rate your relationship with parents, children, relatives, close friends?
How many points would you rate your income, assets? How well do you understand finance?
Place of work, professional skills, career growth
How many points would you rate your place of work, professional skills, career growth?
I feel like it\'s not mine
The brightness of life, communication, travel, entertainment, sleep
How many points would you rate the brightness of your life, communication, travel, entertainment, sleep quality?
Sometimes I burn out, I don\'t get enough rest
Rarely able to escape to rest
Realization of potential, hobby, personal development
How many points would you rate the realization of your potential, hobbies, personal development?
It\'s hard to do just one thing
How many points would you rate your emotions, state of mind? Do you practice meditation?\n\nAfter all ratings, click "Save"

This graph shows which areas of your life are already at a good level, and which areas need to be pumped.

To make the wheel round, you need to align the values - reduce the importance of one or do something in other areas. Keep regular entries in the diary section. So you can clearly see the results.

Each time you add an event to your diary, you gain or lose points towards your current level. For example, I did exercises - plus 0.1 to health. Closed an important deal - plus 0.1 to work. Etc

Every day, with due effort, the wheel will straighten its edges more and more. That\'s the point of Get Better.

Do not forget to regularly multiply bright events and do not neglect areas that require attention.
Incredible!\nThe sphere has been worked out to the maximum.\nNow you can pay attention to other spheres.
Enter the text of the entry
This is where your diary posts will be. Each of them will pump your wheel of life. Try adding the first entry

string-array.name: faq_title
string-array.item: Why should I value my areas of life?
How to make a recurring task?
What to expect in the future?

string-array.name: faq_text
string-array.item:
Here you get 3 strategic advantages over yesterday's self:

 1. You roughly imagined for yourself what 10 out of 10 is in a particular area 

2. You realized that there is room to develop and grow, what to improve right now 

3. You saw which areas you lag behind the rest, and this does not allow you to be completely perfect

Remember what 10 out of 10 is for the area you are setting a goal for. 

Now visualize it. What can you do today to make this picture/feeling a little closer to you in reality? 

If you dream of perfect health, your goal could be "run a marathon in 2022", or anything that brings you closer to your desired 10 out of 10. 

We recommend that you move towards your goal in stages, like "run 5 km in 30 minutes", then "run 10 km in 55 minutes". So you will have a feeling of victory much more often, and this is an insanely important component of moving forward.

To do this, you can select the date of the first execution and select the record type "habit", specifying the repetition interval. 

When a "habit" is completed, it will reappear on the desired date. 

We already know how to make this more convenient and will include it in future updates, including the ability to select days of the week.

Start by rating all areas of your life from 1 to 10 on a satisfaction scale. 

1 means you are very dissatisfied, it couldn't get any worse, and 10 is an ideal, almost unattainable, but still possible. 

You can also create your own spheres of life by customizing the wheel for yourself.

When creating or editing a post, you may notice a slider. Here you can choose whether the recording improves, worsens or does not affect the performance of your area of life. \n\nThe indicator changes according to the selected difficulty level in the settings.

Let's take us as an example: for us, 10 out of 10 in Career is "Get Better use more, Facebook feed for an hour, we have a huge office in the heart of Silicon Valley, we have helped more than 1 billion people live the life they want, and launched powerful wave. 

This is not a goal, give yourself free rein, this is your beacon, you can dream big here. At the same time, 10 out of 10 in the Friends realm might sound like "2 real friends we see every week." 

You get the idea, 10 depends on your ambitions in this area, and individually for you personally.
A lot of everything. Follow our updates in the telegram group or write to the developers personally. You can find this functionality on the settings screen.

resources.string: Post notes 3 days in a row
Post notes 7 days in a row
Only 1 tracker can be active at a time
Create a new area of interest
GetBetter is an app that helps you determine which spheres you need to improve in order to achieve harmony.
Look out for the next update!
Habits that have not yet been completed are displayed here.\n\nHold a habit for 3 seconds to close it.

In order to develop your wheel of life, you need to add entries about your life to the diary.\n\nThese can be goals, habits, ordinary entries describing bright events, or tracking time for some event.
This is the wheel of life, showing your progress. \nYou can change them, delete them, or add your own.
For example, morning exercises, a chapter of a book was read, a new acquaintance
